refnamediv.refpurpose: Converts an long integer address into a string in (IPv4) Internet standard dotted format

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns the Internet IP address as a string, &return.falseforfailure;.

&reftitle.notes;
On 32-bit architectures, casting integer representations of IP addresses from string to int will not give correct results for numbers which exceed PHP_INT_MAX.
